item.title: …baby one more meme
item.description: /c/…baby one more meme on poptalk.scrubbles.tech https://poptalk.scrubbles.tech/c/memes Description A Lemmy home for super-classy memes featuring or alluding to popstars. The basic rules apply: - Don't put anything here you wouldn't put elsewhere on PopTalk. Keep it clean and don't be a dick. - Stay on topic. We like both kinds, pop *and* music. Beyond that, run away with memes! Details * Subscribers 25 Posts 12 Comments 3 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 3 Monthly Active Users 3 Published 2023-06-09 15:58:26 Updated 2023-06-10 02:15:54 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: Carly Rae Jepsen
item.description: /c/Carly Rae Jepsen on poptalk.scrubbles.tech https://poptalk.scrubbles.tech/c/carlyraejepsen Description General Carly Rae Jepsen discussion. Run away with us! We're your type! Some basic guidelines: - Posts should be about Carly. - Thoughtful criticism is fine, but open trolling or low-effort posts like “Her music sux” will be removed. - General “Don’t be a dick” rules apply, no trolling, no being a jerk. - No NSFW. Details * Subscribers 4 Posts 4 Comments 1 Daily Active Users 2 Weekly Active Users 3 Monthly Active Users 3 Published 2023-06-14 16:27:03 Updated 2023-06-14 17:12:26 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:05:59

item.title: PopHeads
item.description: /c/PopHeads on poptalk.scrubbles.tech https://poptalk.scrubbles.tech/c/popheads Description Your go to spot for pop music discussion on Lemmy! Some basic guidelines: * Posts should be about or at least in the vicinity of Pop Music * Honest criticism of artists is fine, but open trolling or low effort posts like “Pop music sux” will be removed. * General “Don’t be a dick” rules apply, no trolling, no being a jerk * No NSFW. This is meant to be a fun community, NSFW doesn't have a place here.

item.title: Taylor Swift
item.description: /c/Taylor Swift on poptalk.scrubbles.tech https://poptalk.scrubbles.tech/c/taylorswift Description General Taylor Swift discussion. Welcome all Swifties! Bring your clown hats, your wild theories, and your hype, this community is for you. Some basic guidelines: - Posts should be about Taylor Swift - Criticism of Taylor is fine, but open trolling or low effort posts like Her music sux will be removed. - General Don't be a dick rules apply, no trolling, no being a jerk
